statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 8 \\ -1 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -16 \\ 2 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
